basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Always looking to learn new things and improve my skills, as well as work in a team and share my knowledge with others. I mainly work with TypeScript, React, and Node.js. Willing to learn and work with new technologies. I have more than 3 months of remote experience.

work.name: GCBA
work.summary: 3-month contract to develop a web application for the management of partners and events. I worked on the development of the database, and the frontend of the application, using React; using agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban.
highlights: "I don't know how he does it, but every time I ask Kevin something, he solves it"
I organized the agile squad in the distribution of tasks and in the implementation of them
I performed in two different roles: analyst and frontend developer
